name: Abu Tiles Puzzle
description:
Tile puzzle game for entertainment puzzle, has a lot of beautiful puzzle pictures available. Practical puzzles, eye brain moving together, is the first choice for leisure and entertainment.
Puzzle game features:
1. a lot of beautiful puzzle to choose
2. each graph has three difficulty can be selected
3. in the course of the game can always see the original
4.and people all over the world together competition results
